experience.description: Contributed to the development of scalable web applications using React, Node.js and Postgres. Worked closely with the team to implement new features, optimize performance across the stack, and improved the user experience.

Led the backend development for a student achievement management system. Implemented RESTful APIs, integrated MongoDB and AWS S3 for data storage, and ensured secure role-based access control. Collaborated with frontend developers to deliver a seamless user experience.
